display_name: Total score for adult Epworth Sleepiness Scale (ESS)
description:
The sum of items 1-7 and 9. [Johns MW 1991 (PubMed ID: 1798888)](https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pubmed/1798888). Scale 0-3 for individual items; 0 to 24 for overall score.

[Search for all ESS variables within this dataset](https://sleepdata.org/datasets/ccshs/variables?search=epworth)
